product_name: Life is good Crusher V-Neck T-Shirt - Boys' - 2013 Closeout
long_description: A super-comfortable V-neck tee for your young outdoor adventurer, the Life is good(R) Crusher T-Shirt for boys is ready for board-fueled adventures in the skate park and around the neighborhood. Cotton is naturally soft, breathable and comfortable. "Crushing" process yields extra loft in fabric and doubles the softness. Closeout.
short_description: A super-comfortable V-neck tee for your young outdoor adventurer, the Life is good(R) Crusher T-Shirt for boys is ready for board-fueled adventures in the skate park and around the neighborhood.
